about.about-description:
A video agency dedicated for more than 12 years to the production and post-production of explainer videos, corporate videos, educational videos, motion graphics, advertising, cinematography, e-commerce video, 2D and 3D animation.

We have a professional human team and the latest equipment technology. Our clients are all over the world. We are CAS-ING
